channel.title: How do i change the out of bounds array for items to exceed over 20000
channel.description:
i get this when I try to spawn torva and my client kicks me off anyone know where to change it so the item can spawn past that in a 508?
Map Amount: 1226 508 Object Amount: 38424 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 97,253,253 - 2,0,0 - 67,98, Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20137 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:172) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:371) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8363) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1957) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8158) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8911) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4790) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: How do i change the out of bounds array for items to exceed over 20000
item.dc:creator: @Stenen Stenen
item.description:
@Stenen wrote:

This must be in Help.
